name: I Want To Believe (arahmitz)
description:
I Want To Believe is a mobile game about abducting cows and energy crystals for the highest score possible. You need a working gyroscope to be able to play. 

I Want To Believe is a prototype made for EEIA JAM 2019 by Crusade Interactive: Maciej Górski (@TheBigDinDonMan), Adam Madej (@itsarahmitz), Szymon Omieciński (@shy_037).
